stratified sampling
```{r}
install.packages("sampling")
library("sampling")
```
Proportion
```{r}
prop = 25
```
srswor simple sample no replace, srswor with replacement, poisson, systematic 
size order is on data set
```{r}
irisSample2 = strata(data = iris, stratanames = c("Species"), size = c(rep(prop, 3)), method = "srswor")
summary(irisSample2)
```
infertility data

```{r}
infert
summary(infert)
```
stratified sampling od education
```{r}
sample = strata( data = infert, stratanames=c("education"), size=c(5,48,47), method = "srswor")
sample 
summary(sample)
```
